credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Takeda Cosmetics for Men, Takeda Chemical Industry
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Central image of women taken from "The Turkish Bath" by Ingres, located within a circle, at the top of which hovers a UFO, with ocean and cliffs in the background. Circle superimposed on Arabesque designs in pink, red, yellow, orange and blue.
name: Poster
